tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (ADJP (RB So) (JJ happy)) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP get) (NP (DT the) (NN day)) (PP (IN off) (NP (NN tomorrow))))) (. !)))
